title: Software Development Engineer - I at Dhan AI Pvt. Ltd.
body: Led the OAuth migration from SAP Gigya to Firebase Auth for the iOS/iPadOS app and the web backend, enhancing Identity and Access Management (IAM) security for 50,000 users without necessitating password resets. Synchronized data across 3 platforms in real-time, utilizing multi-threading, RabbitMQ, and Redis for caching, to ensure seamless integration and data consistency. Developed an innovative admin system using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) to simulate user sessions, significantly improving debugging capabilities while maintaining single sign-on (SSO) and two-factor authentication standards.

title: Student Software Developer at Decision Theater Lab at Arizona State University
body: Contributed to Project SHELDUS, in coordination with the Department of Defense, to maintain and categorize data related to natural disasters from 1960 to the present. Developed REST APIs using Flask and Python, and wrote queries to efficiently retrieve and calculate the required data values for users.

title: Graduate Teaching Assistant at Arizona State University
body: Served as a Graduate Teaching Assistant to Prof. Maria Chavez and Prof. Mohd. Taher, instructing over 150 students in the Fulton School of Engineering at ASU. Taught programming in MATLAB and Python to over 100 undergraduate and graduate students, and guided them through their master's project utilizing Raspberry Pi, as part of the course (FSE-100) Introduction to Engineering.

title: Master of Science in Computer Science at Arizona State University
body: Relevant Coursework: (CSE-539) Applied Cryptography, (CSE-511) Data Processing at Scale, (CSE-575) Statistical Machine Learning, (CSE-576) Natural Language Processing, and (CSE-545) Software Security.

title: Full-stack Developer at Compliance Group Inc.
body: Played a key role in the backend development of FDAlytics and iQuality using Python, Django REST Framework and later, GraphQL, contributing to a 20% uplift in data processing efficiency. Collaborated with a team of 6 developers to develop a data categorization module, significantly enhancing data retrieval speed and accuracy using Azure Search. Contributed to the implementation testing and deployment pipelines using PyTest, Jest, and GitHub Actions for CI/CD processes, which cut down deployment errors by 50% and improved the quality of the deliverables.

title: Software Engineer at AuthBase Inc.
body: Developed LiveShield, leveraging ElasticSearch, Logstash, and Kibana (ELK) for dynamic scanning of over 10,000 DLLs (Dynamic Link Libraries), enhancing real-time security analytics, and alerts using socket.io. Integrated Nessus and NMap-based packet sniffers for in-depth vulnerability scans, utilizing NVD (National Vulnerability Database) and CVE (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) for robust threat management. Achieved a 40% improvement in security effectiveness, aligning with NVD advisories and CVSS risk assessments.

title: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering at Panjab University
body: Developed and maintained back end API using Graph QL, functionalities and test-cases using React JS and Jest, for various modules of the product iQuality. Helped improve the performance metrics by 30%. Collaborated with the development team of 25 members in maintaining the MySQL database and UI bug-fixing tasks for an efficient workflow.
